questions.question: I need to ---- my eyes ---- before I can get new glasses.
questions.explanation: Passive causative yapı: 'have + object + past participle'. Gözlerimi muayene ettirmek.

questions.question: The professor ---- the students ---- the experiment again due to errors in the data.
questions.explanation: 'make + person + bare infinitive' yapısı. Öğrencileri zorla tekrar yaptırmak.

questions.question: After hours of negotiation, we finally ---- them ---- to our terms.
questions.explanation: 'get + person + to infinitive' yapısı. İkna ederek kabul ettirmek, çaba gerektirir ('finally' kelimesi ipucu).

questions.question: The company ---- all employees ---- safety training last month.
questions.explanation: 'have + person + bare infinitive'. Şirket çalışanların eğitime katılmasını sağladı (otorite).

questions.question: She ---- her car ---- at the garage on Main Street.
questions.explanation: Passive causative: 'have/get + object + past participle'. Arabasını servise götürdü.

questions.question: The new policy ---- companies ---- their environmental impact.
questions.explanation: 'make + person/thing + bare infinitive'. Politika şirketleri zorla değerlendirme yapmaya yönlendiriyor.

questions.question: My parents ---- me ---- studying abroad after I convinced them.
questions.explanation: 'let + person + bare infinitive'. İzin vermek. 'After I convinced them' ifadesi izin anlamını destekliyor.

questions.question: He was ---- to resign from his position due to the scandal.
questions.explanation: Passive yapıda 'make' → 'was made to + infinitive'. İstifaya zorlandı.

questions.question: I need to ---- my laptop ---- as soon as possible.
questions.explanation: Passive causative: 'have + object + past participle'. Laptop'umu tamir ettirmek.

questions.question: The manager couldn't ---- the team ---- the proposal on time.
questions.explanation: 'make + person + bare infinitive'. Takımı tamamlamaya zorlayamadı.

questions.question: She finally ---- her landlord ---- the broken heating system.
questions.explanation: 'get + person + to infinitive'. İkna ederek tamir ettirmek. 'finally' çaba göstergesi.

questions.question: Don't ---- me ---- my mind about this decision.
questions.explanation: 'make + person + bare infinitive'. Zorla fikir değiştirtmek.

questions.question: I'm going to ---- my hair ---- this weekend.
questions.explanation: Passive causative: 'have + object + past participle'. Saçımı kestireceğim.

questions.question: The supervisor ---- all staff members ---- the new safety procedures.
questions.explanation: 'have + person + bare infinitive'. Personelin prosedürleri takip etmesini sağladı (otorite).

questions.question: She ---- her assistant ---- the documents before the meeting.
questions.explanation: 'have + person + bare infinitive'. Asistanın belgeleri hazırlamasını sağladı.

questions.question: Will you ---- me ---- your phone for a minute?
questions.explanation: 'let + person + bare infinitive'. İzin vermek (rica ederken).

questions.question: The teacher ---- the students ---- their essays to improve clarity.
questions.explanation: 'make + person + bare infinitive'. Öğrencileri zorla tekrar yazdırdı.

questions.question: I need to ---- the documents ---- into English.
questions.explanation: Passive causative: 'have + object + past participle'. Belgeleri tercüme ettirmek.

questions.question: They couldn't ---- him ---- his opinion despite all their efforts.
questions.explanation: 'make + person + bare infinitive'. Zorla fikir değiştirtmeye çalıştılar ama başaramadılar.

questions.question: She was ---- to apologize for her inappropriate comments.
questions.explanation: Passive yapı: 'was made to apologize'. Özür dilemeye zorlandı.
